## API Reference

## Packages

|  Package | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [react-message-context](./react-message-context.md) | An efficient React front-end for message formatting libraries. Designed in particular for use with [messageformat](https://messageformat.github.io)<!-- -->, but will work with any messages. Provides the best possible API for a front-end developer, without making the back end any more difficult than it needs to be either. Should add at most about 1kB to your compiled &amp; minified bundle size. |
